profile.name: Joyce Byers
profile.headline: Single mother and retail professional who has demonstrated investigative tenacity, crisis leadership, and protective determination that would put most federal agents to shame. When institutions failed, she didn't.
profile.executiveSummary: A retail worker and single mother whose professional resume barely hints at her true capabilities. When her son disappeared and every authority said he was dead, Joyce refused to accept it and conducted her own investigation that proved correct. She has since navigated government conspiracies, traveled to Soviet Russia, and rescued people from interdimensional threats — all while working retail and raising two boys alone.

evidence.outcome: Located missing child when police, state investigators, and federal agents all declared him dead
evidence.description: Pursued independent investigation against unanimous institutional conclusions, proving that Will was alive in an alternate dimension

evidence.outcome: Identified electromagnetic anomalies in Hawkins before any scientist or government agency
evidence.description: Connected seemingly random compass and magnet behavior to larger pattern indicating dimensional breach

evidence.outcome: Made life-or-death decisions for family across 4 crisis events with consistently right judgment
evidence.description: Assessed threats accurately and chose correct course of action when stakes were highest and information was minimal

evidence.outcome: Decided to relocate family across country to protect children from government surveillance
evidence.description: Made difficult strategic decision to uproot family when staying put posed unacceptable risk

evidence.outcome: Built interdimensional communication system using Christmas lights and alphabet
evidence.description: Improvised functional communication channel to contact son in alternate dimension using household materials

evidence.outcome: Traveled to Soviet Union and infiltrated military prison to rescue Jim Hopper
evidence.description: Organized and executed international rescue mission without government support, military training, or resources

evidence.outcome: Maintained reliable customer service at Melvald's through extraordinary personal circumstances
evidence.description: Continued to show up and perform retail duties while managing crises that would have incapacitated most people

evidence.outcome: Managed daily operations at Melvald's General Store for 8+ years
evidence.description: Handled inventory, customer service, cash management, and store opening/closing procedures reliably

evidence.outcome: Connected electromagnetic anomalies to dimensional gate activity before scientists did
evidence.description: Noticed magnets falling off refrigerator and traced the pattern to its source, identifying threat when trained professionals missed it

evidence.outcome: Raised two sons as single parent on retail worker salary
evidence.description: Managed household finances, childcare, and domestic operations with minimal resources and no partner support

evidence.outcome: Maintained household on single retail income for 10+ years
evidence.description: Stretched limited budget across rent, food, utilities, and children's needs without external support

evidence.outcome: Provided emergency medical care to children and adults during crisis events
evidence.description: Applied basic medical knowledge to treat injuries when professional medical help was unavailable

evidence.outcome: Served as driver and navigator during multiple crisis response operations
evidence.description: Provided reliable transportation under stressful and dangerous conditions

evidence.outcome: Traveled to Soviet Union and navigated foreign country without language skills or preparation
evidence.description: Managed international travel logistics in hostile foreign environment to execute rescue mission

evidence.outcome: Fought interdimensional threats, government conspiracies, and Soviet military to protect her children
evidence.description: No force — natural or supernatural — has ever stopped Joyce Byers from protecting the people she loves

evidence.outcome: Trusted maternal instinct when every authority figure told her she was wrong — and was right every time
evidence.description: Followed gut feeling that Will was alive, that magnets meant something, that Hopper was alive, proving correct each time

evidence.outcome: Maintained family stability through 4 existential crises, divorce, poverty, and relocation
evidence.description: Kept functioning as parent, employee, and crisis responder through sustained adversity that would break most people

evidence.outcome: Entered alternate dimension to rescue her son with no training, equipment, or backup
evidence.description: Walked into the Upside Down armed with nothing but determination and an axe

evidence.outcome: Took in Eleven providing maternal care and stability to traumatized child
evidence.description: Extended protective instinct beyond biological children to provide home and family to a child who had never known either

evidence.outcome: Continued investigation for weeks when everyone including her own son told her to stop
evidence.description: Maintained belief and effort when completely alone in her conviction, sustaining investigation against unanimous opposition

workHistory.title: Retail Associate
workHistory.description: Customer service, inventory management, and daily store operations at Hawkins general store for 8 years.

workHistory.title: Retail Associate
workHistory.description: Continued retail work after relocating family to California for safety.

purpose: Don't tell me what's possible. I found my son in another dimension with Christmas lights. I know what's possible.
